cause.description:
VolunteerMatch is a nonprofit organization that helps good people and good causes connect.
Our website, www.VolunteerMatch.org, helps millions of people each year find a way to give back to their communities.
VolunteerMatch also offers technology solutions to nonprofits in need of volunteers, and corporations interested in employee volunteer programs or cause marketing campaigns.
By supporting VolunteerMatch, you support the work that we do to help ALL causes.
1. Supports all nonprofits by helping them find volunteers.
2. Helps volunteers find a nonprofit to vounteer with.
3. Strengthens communities by promoting service, and making it easy for people to volunteer.
cause.mission: Helps everyone find a place to volunteer.
cause.name: VolunteerMatch
